RelatedSentence: Russia 's top general Valery Gerasimov has told the chairman of NATO 's Military Committee Knud Bartels by telephone that the Atlantic bloc 's increased military activity near the Russian border is not helping European security , the Defense Ministry said on May 19 .

Russia 's top general Valery Gerasimov has told the chairman of NATO 's Military Committee Knud Bartels by telephone that the Atlantic bloc 's increased military activity near the Russian border is not helping European security , the Defense Ministry said on May 19 .
